'''Beta 1.9 Prerelease 6''' is the sixth and final pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.0.0]], released on November 11, 2011,<ref>{{tweet|jeb_|135018767620112385|So here's the 6th beta 1.9 prerelease: http://assets.minecraft.net/1_9-pre6/minecraft.jar|November 11, 2011}}</ref> which adds [[dragon egg]]s, [[ender crystal]]s, credits, new video settings, changes the mining time of some blocks, changes the [[ender dragon]] boss fight, and fixes some bugs. This is the final pre-release released in 2011.

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Dragon_Egg_JE1.png|32px]] [[Dragon Egg]]'''
* Is a gravity-affected [[block]].
* Can be obtained only once per [[world]] by defeating the [[ender dragon]].
* Can be picked up by placing a non-full block, such as a torch, under a block and breaking it.
* Teleports when you try to mine it.

=== Non-mob entities ===
'''[[File:End Crystal JE1 BE1.gif|32px]] [[Ender Crystal]]'''
* Sits atop of a block of bedrock. 
* It is diamond shaped, with 2 cubes spinning on their axis with a point at the center. 
* Fires a healing beam at the ender dragon when within range. 
* Can be destroyed with a melee or hit with an arrow, causing an explosion. 
* They appear on all obsidian pillars in the End.

=== General ===
'''[[Credit sequence]]'''
* Is the lines of text and music that play after the the [[End Poem]].

'''[[End Poem]]'''
* Is a freehand narrative poem written by novelist and poet [[wikipedia:Julian_Gough|Julian Gough]] that can be seen when the [[player]] enters the [[exit portal]] in [[the End]] dimension.

'''<code>[[client.jar|Minecraft.jar]]</code>'''
* Added the following files to <code>/title/</code>:
** <code>credits.txt</code>
** <code>earlyplayers.txt</code>
** <code>win.txt</code>

'''[[Video settings]]'''
* Added "Particles" setting, which has three possible states:
** "All", rendering all particle effects.
** "Decreased", rendering half of all particle effects.
** "Minimal", rendering no particle effects (except for those created when breaking blocks).

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''General'''
* Several block's tool weaknesses have been fixed, such as [[crafting table]]s now mining faster with an axe and [[rail]]s now mining faster with a pickaxe.

'''[[File:Red Bed (N) JE1.png|32px]] [[Bed]]s'''
* Attempting to sleep in a bed while hostile mobs are nearby displays "You may not rest now, there are monsters nearby".

'''[[File:Brick Stairs (N) JE2 BE2.png|32px]] [[Brick Stairs]]'''
* Now it droped out by itself.

'''[[File:Chest.gif|32px]] [[File:Large Chest.gif|32px]] [[Chest]]s'''
* Are no longer prevented from opening from other chests on top.

'''[[File:Coal Ore JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Coal Ore]]'''
* Can now be smelted in a [[furnace]] into [[coal]].

'''[[File:Cobblestone Stairs (N) JE2 BE3.png|32px]] [[Cobblestone Stairs]]'''
* Now it droped out by itself.

'''[[File:Dead Bush JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Dead Bush|Shrub]]'''
* Is now called "Shrub".

'''[[File:Detector Rail (NS) JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Detector Rail]]'''
* Is now mined faster using pickaxes.

'''[[File:Fern JE3.png|32px]] [[Fern]]'''
* Is now called "Fern".
* Are now available in the [[creative]] [[inventory]].

'''[[File:Fire JE1.png|32px]] [[Fire]]'''
* Fire above [[bedrock]] in the End now burns forever.

'''[[File:Grass Block JE6 BE5.png|32px]] [[Grass Block]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Grass Block JE5.png|32px]].

'''[[File:Iron Door JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Iron door]]'''
* Decreased mining time.

'''[[File:Iron Bars (EW) JE3.png|32px]] [[Iron Bars]]'''
* Decreased mining time.

'''[[File:Monster Spawner JE2.png|32px]] [[Monster Spawner]]'''
* Decreased mining time.

'''[[File:Nether Bricks JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Nether Bricks]]'''
* Decreased mining time.

'''[[File:Nether Brick Stairs (N) JE1.png|32px]] [[Nether Brick Stairs]]'''
* Now it droped out by itself.

'''[[File:Nether Portal (EW) JE2.png|32px]] [[Nether Portal (block)]]'''
* No longer affected by [[Light#Smooth lighting|Smooth Lightning]].

'''[[File:Lapis Lazuli Ore JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Lapis Lazuli Ore]]'''
* Can now be smelted in a [[furnace]] into [[lapis lazuli]].

'''[[File:Lily Pad JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Lily Pad]]s'''
* Now have collision.
* Are no longer restricted to be placed in swamps.
* Can be placed by aiming at water.
* Are now available in the Creative inventory.

'''[[File:Obsidian JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Obsidian]]'''
* Decreased mining time.

'''[[File:Powered Rail (NS) JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Powered Rail]]'''
* Is now mined faster using pickaxes.

'''[[File:Rail (NS) JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Rail]]s'''
* Is now mined faster using pickaxes.

'''[[File:Redstone Ore JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Redstone Ore]]'''
* Is now mined faster using pickaxes.
* Decreased mining time.
* Can now be smelted in a [[furnace]] into [[redstone dust]].

'''[[File:Sand JE3 BE2.png|32px]] [[Sand]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Sand JE2 BE1.png|32px]].

'''[[File:Stone Bricks JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Stone Bricks]]'''
* Decreased mining time.

'''[[File:Stone Brick Slab JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Stone Bricks Slab]]'''
* Decreased mining time.

'''[[File:Stone Brick Stairs (N) JE1.png|32px]] [[Stone Brick Stairs]]'''
* Now it droped out by itself.
* Decreased mining time.

'''[[File:Water JE11 BE1.gif|32px]] [[Water]]'''
* Downward flowing water now creates flowing water once more.

'''[[File:Oak Door JE3 BE1.png|32px]] [[Wooden Door]]'''
* Decreased mining time.

'''[[File:Oak Stairs (N) JE3 BE3.png|32px]] [[Wooden Stairs]]'''
* Now it droped out by itself.

=== Items ===
'''{{Animate|Wooden Axe JE1 BE1.png; Stone Axe JE1 BE1.png; Iron Axe JE4 BE1.png; Golden Axe JE1.png; Diamond Axe JE1 BE1.png|32px}} {{animate|Wooden Hoe JE1 BE1.png; Stone Hoe JE1 BE1.png; Iron Hoe JE1 BE1.png; Golden Hoe JE1 BE1.png; Diamond Hoe JE1 BE1.png|32px}} {{Animate|Wooden Pickaxe JE1 BE1.png; Stone Pickaxe JE1 BE1.png; Iron Pickaxe JE2 BE1.png; Golden Pickaxe JE1.png; Diamond Pickaxe JE1 BE1.png|32px}} {{Animate|Wooden Shovel JE1 BE1.png; Stone Shovel JE1 BE1.png; Iron Shovel JE2 BE1.png; Golden Shovel JE1.png; Diamond Shovel JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Tool]]s'''
* Tools not suited to digging a certain block can be faster than digging by hand, e.g. a pickaxe can dig dirt faster than by hand, but not faster than by shovel.

'''[[File:Bow JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Bow]]s'''
* Can be fired without having [[arrow]]s in [[Creative]] mode, but use up arrows from the creative mode inventory, if available.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Ender Dragon.gif|64px]] [[Ender Dragon]]'''
* A "Boss health" bar appears on the middle top part of the screen, in the same purple hue as the ender dragon.
* When killed, now leaves behind an exit portal with the dragon egg sitting on top to return the player to their spawn point.

'''{{Animate|Orange Sheep JE1.png;Magenta Sheep JE1.png;Light Blue Sheep JE1.png;Yellow Sheep JE1.png;Lime Sheep JE1.png;Pink Sheep JE1.png;Gray Sheep JE1.png;Light Gray Sheep JE1.png;Cyan Sheep JE1.png;Purple Sheep JE1.png;Blue Sheep JE1.png;Green Sheep JE1.png;Brown Sheep JE1.png;Red Sheep JE1.png;Black Sheep JE1.png|32px}} [[Sheep]]'''
* Baby sheep from dyed parents are now born dyed instead of always being white.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Enchanting]]'''
* [[Efficiency]] enchantment now affects all blocks for any item enchanted with it.

'''[[Select World]]'''
* The world file size is no longer displayed.

'''[[Sun]] and [[moon]]'''
* Are now square again.

== Fixes ==
'''11 bugs fixed'''
* Entity model errors fixed.
* [[Armor]] durability is back to being much higher, higher than it ever was in Beta 1.8.
* Using items and hitting mobs no longer uses up items/durability in Creative.
* Ferns and grass are now available in the creative inventory.
* Unnecessary block versions of [[cake]] and [[sugar cane]] removed from creative inventory.
* [[Enchantment table]]s now take time to mine, instead of one punch.
* "Mods and Texture Packs" changed to "Texture Packs".
* Repeater clocks no longer get stuck when unloading the chunk.
* Placing fences under farmland doesn't stop it from turning back into dirt.
* A minecart with furnace is able to push empty minecarts in any direction.
* Baby sheep from dyed parents are now born dyed instead of always being white.</onlyinclude>

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* [[Wooden door]]s can be opened only using redstone.

== Trivia ==
* This version was released on 11/11/11 (November 11, 2011). That date was the planned release date for [[Java Edition 1.0.0|1.0.0]] and [[MINECON 2011]].<ref>{{citation|url=https://notch.tumblr.com/post/5388689217/minecraftcon-2011-in-vegas|title=MinecraftCon 2011 in Vegas?|website=The Word of Notch|date=May 11, 2011}}</ref>
* This is the last version where the player makes the classical "ooh!" sound when hurt.
* This is the first version where the game can be legitimately beaten without mods or cheats.
